name: Shadow Demon
lore: Shadow demons are incorporeal fiends spawned from the darkest recesses of the Abyss. They lurk in dim places, feeding on fear and despair. When not serving a more powerful demon, a shadow demon hunts mortals, tormenting victims before draining the life from them. In Bright Light, a shadow demon is weakened and vulnerable, but in darkness it is a lethal predator that can pass through walls and vanish into the gloom.
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the demon has Disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

multiattack.description: The demon makes two Shadow Claw attacks.

actions.name: Shadow Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Psychic damage.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: The demon takes the Hide action. It can take this Bonus Action only while in Dim Light or Darkness.
